name: WiderTube - YouTube 720p
description:
--WiderTube 720p for large 1920+ screens--
Widens all videos to 1280x720. (Even the small size). 
Widens other parts of youtube too. 
Adds a darker background to the left and right of the player. 
Changes some annoying parts of youtube to be less annoying.
additional_info:
0.2.6 - Some ugly fixes to the player alignment.
0.2.5 - Some fixes. Flashplayer support no longer a priority. Use HTML5! :)
0.2.4 - Sidebar changed again. -.- Fixes some of it.
0.2.3 - Some minor fixes.
0.2.2 - Another minor sidebar fix.
0.2.1 - Minor sidebar fix.
0.2.0 - A couple of fixes.
0.1.9 - Restored the dark background plus some other minor fixes.
0.1.8 - Some fixes to make things aligned with the new youtube layout.
0.1.7 - Minor left aligned fix.
0.1.6 - Some minor improvements.
0.1.5 - Temporary fix for the old left aligned page. Not perfect yet. (Don't watch with playlists.)
0.1.4 - Some bug fixes and changed behavior of the masthead-appbar.
0.1.3 - Fixed the HTML5 video player. (Now also hides the controls when the mouse isn't hovering the container.)
0.1.2 - Fixed the annoying guide menu from pushing the page to the right.
0.1.1 - Fixed comments section after apis.google.com domain change.
0.1 - First release.
